citation: Proclamation under the Residential Tenancy Amendment Act 2003 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Residential Tenancy Amendment Act 2003

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Residential Tenancy Amendment Act 2003 fix 5 March 2004 as the day on which the provisions of that Act, other than section 6, commence.

23 February 2004

Richard Butler

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

Judy Jackson

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 3 March 2004

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
